title: m4rcusbtw
author: m4rcusbtw
content: Hi guys I'm Marcos I'm from Argentina, I don't know if I can do this here but I've been thinking this for almost two weeks and I'm  done I cannot keep myself in this situation I'm at my lowest and I feel that I can't progress in my country with almost 150% anual inflation prices going up every day and our currency going down. Well I'm gonna be direct I need $2000  to leave my country I'm not asking to give me that money straight up but any help is accepted. I work every day here but that sum of money is impossible to achieve for me because I'm earning less that $10 per day I'm working as a painter for the moment but I'm a electro mechanic technician is also difficult to get a job in my city I'm also studying programming. I'm planning to leave to new Zealand I'm going there with a working holiday visa once I get there I will be able to repay the loan.  I know that loans for newbies and without collateral is extremely difficult to get but as I previous said I don't know what to do and the situation here is so bad, I'm being serious and I'm doing this because I  have nothing to lose, well that's it I'm sorry if I cannot do this here and if my English is not that good thanks for reading and have good day!.If you want to contact me to get more information/proof that I'm a person that really needs it :Email: marcosleiva717@gmail.comDiscord: m4rcusbtw#1540Btc wallet: bc1qlsl6tgqk58n87dkcddn27wnvxa7kadwp2kktj0

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Some of you joke a lot. This sob stories won't cut it here, even if you write a full novel. You are not going to get a loan.If your very own people or local bank can't lend you $2000. Then what makes you think an online stranger who does not even know your face is just going to happily forward you behind a brand new account the $2,000 without any valid collateral offered to assure him that you will repay back the loan.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: So you're country is in hardship and already you're planning a vacation half way around the world once you get out of a little bit of financial trouble.  Might be best if you get your life and finances in order before you come grovelling for a *cough* donation you aren't likely to pay back.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: A lender doesn't really care about your problems (no offense). It's a business and his concern is if he can get his money back in time.You provide no guarantee at all, so yes, you got it right now, you don't really have a chance to get a loan here.Plus, if you are in such a bad situation, I kinda doubt you afford to invest into crypto.Advices? Sell what you can sell, or try your luck with real life friends, bank, or pawn shop.
